name: MediSearch
headline: Search engine for trustworthy medical information.
description: MediSearch gives direct answers to medical questions based on trustworthy sources.

founders.name: Eduard Oravkin, Founder
founders.description: Working on giving people instant answers to health questions with https://medisearch.io.

founders.name: Michal Pándy, Founder
founders.description: I am an Imperial & Cambridge CS grad with ML research experience from Waymo, Google Brain, and Facebook AI. These days I'm trying to make the world a better place one medical question at a time.

generated_description:
**MediSearch: A Beacon of Trustworthy Medical Information**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, MediSearch is on a mission to be your reliable search engine for medical inquiries. Based in London, UK, this dynamic startup is a compact team of four, driven by the belief that everyone deserves access to trustworthy health information.

MediSearch was born from the need for direct, science-based answers to pressing medical questions. It utilizes artificial intelligence and generative AI technologies to sift through vast amounts of data and provide clear, concise responses drawn from credible sources. Whether you’re curious about the benefits of coffee or the potential side effects of vaccines, MediSearch aims to deliver evidence-based insights.

Their web platform offers an array of features, including the ability to filter both common and complex medical queries. For example, users can explore questions like “Does sport increase life expectancy?” or “What is the probability of blood clots after surgery?” with just a few clicks. 

MediSearch is particularly relevant today, as misinformation in healthcare can have serious consequences. The company maintains that while their tool is an excellent resource for information, it doesn’t replace professional medical advice. 

You can find them online at [medisearch.io](https://medisearch.io), where they also provide an app for on-the-go access to trustworthy health information. The company is tagged under several categories, including artificial intelligence, consumer health services, and digital health, underscoring their innovative approach to healthcare solutions. 

In summary, MediSearch is setting out to empower users with reliable medical knowledge, striving to enhance the way individuals seek answers in healthcare. If you're looking for clarity in a world awash with conflicting health information, MediSearch could just be what you need.
